title: The tears of fancie. Or, Loue disdained
author: T. W., fl. 1573-1595.
publisher: [By J. Danter] for William Barley, dwell[ing] in Gratious streete oure against Leaden Hall,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page of only known copy is mutilated, affecting imprint.
